TEXT: The applicant is a NORP citizen , born in DATE and residing in GPE , GPE . She is represented before the ORG by her son , PERSON PERSON .

The applicant claims that in DATE her parents in law transferred to her by means of a sale contract a right to keep a pharmacy in GPE as a real right . Such a right was considered a property right that included a right to keep a pharmacy and the ownership of the pharmacy itself . In DATE the contract between the applicant and her parents in law was annulled . On DATE all property of the applicant 's parents in law was confiscated .

On DATE ORG enacted GPE of and Compensation for Property Taken during ORG ( Zakon o naknadi za imovinu oduzetu za TIME jugoslavenske komunističke vladavine ) , that enabled former owners of confiscated and nationalised property to seek either restitution of or compensation for the property taken from them .
On DATE the applicant lodged a request for restitution of the confiscated property with an administrative body , which has not yet issued a decision .
The relevant articles of LAW ( Zakon o općem upravnom postupku ) provide as follows .

LAW provides that in simple matters , where there is no need to undertake separate examination proceedings , an administrative body is obliged to issue a decision within DATE after a party lodged a request . In all other , more complex , cases , an administrative body is obliged to issue a decision within DATE after the request was lodged .
LAW enables a party whose request has not been decided within the periods established in the previous paragraph to lodge an appeal , as if his request had been denied .
The relevant provisions of LAW ( Zakon o upravnim sporovima ) provides as follows .
Article CARDINAL enables a party who lodged a request with an administrative body to institute administrative proceedings before ORG ( administrative dispute ) in the following situations :

CARDINAL . If the appellate body does not issue a decision upon the applicant 's appeal within DATE the applicant may repeat his request , and if the appellate body declines to issue a decision within DATE the applicant may lodge a claim with ORG .
CARDINAL . When a first instance administrative body does not issue a decision and there is no right to an appeal the applicant may directly lodge a request with ORG .

CARDINAL . If a first instance administrative body does not issue a decision upon the applicant 's request within DATE in matters where a right to an appeal exists , the applicant may lodge his request to the appellate administrative body . Against the decision of that body the applicant may institute administrative proceedings as well , and if that body has not issued a decision there is a right to institute administrative proceedings under the conditions set out in paragraph CARDINAL ( see above CARDINAL ) .
